messages: Metadata contentType should be one of: [Resource, Collection, TextBook, LessonPlan, Course, Template, Asset, Plugin, LessonPlanUnit, CourseUnit, TextBookUnit, TeachingMethod, PedagogyFlow, FocusSpot, LearningOutcomeDefinition, PracticeQuestionSet, CuriosityQuestionSet, MarkingSchemeRubric, ExplanationResource, ExperientialResource, ConceptMap, SelfAssess, PracticeResource, eTextBook, OnboardingResource, ExplanationVideo, ClassroomTeachingVideo, ExplanationReadingMaterial, LearningActivity, PreviousBoardExamPapers, LessonPlanResource]
